definition[0]: the day between Saturday and Monday
example[0]: What are you doing Sunday? American English
example[1]: Sunday nights are usually pretty quiet.
example[2]: It was our wedding anniversary last Sunday.
example[3]: There’s another antiques market this Sunday.
example[4]: We’ll announce the winners next Sunday.
example[5]: We’re going to a match on Sunday.
example[6]: Finding a dentist on a Sunday can be very difficult.
